events.name: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_label: Syria readmitted into the Arab League
events.wd_description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.
events.description: The Arab League's foreign ministers adopted a decision to readmit Syria into the league after more than a decade of suspension.

events.name: Immediate effect of readmission
events.wd_description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.
events.description: Syria could resume its participation in Arab League meetings with immediate effect.

events.name: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_label: Call for resolution of Syrian crisis
events.wd_description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.
events.description: The Arab League called for a resolution of the crisis resulting from Syria’s civil war, including the flight of refugees and drug smuggling across the region.

events.name: Formation of ministerial contact group
events.wd_description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.
events.description: Jordan, Saudi Arabia, Iraq, Lebanon, Egypt, and the Secretary General of the Arab League would form a ministerial contact group to liaise with the Syrian government and seek a steady solution to the crisis.

events.name: Extreme Weather and Smoke Pollution Affect Vast Regions of the United States
events.wd_label: Extreme Weather and Smoke Pollution Affect Vast Regions of the United States
events.wd_description: Large parts of the United States are facing extreme weather, with triple-digit temperatures in the south and southwest and widespread smoke pollution in the Midwest due to fires in northern Quebec. Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, and more than 40 million are under excessive heat notifications.
events.description: Large parts of the United States are facing extreme weather, with triple-digit temperatures in the south and southwest and widespread smoke pollution in the Midwest due to fires in northern Quebec. Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, and more than 40 million are under excessive heat notifications.

events.name: Extreme Heat in Southern and Southwestern US
events.wd_label: Extreme Heat in Southern and Southwestern US
events.wd_description: Temperatures in the southern and southwestern United States have reached triple digits, with a heat dome contributing to widespread excessive heat warnings affecting more than 40 million Americans.
events.description: Temperatures in the southern and southwestern United States have reached triple digits, with a heat dome contributing to widespread excessive heat warnings affecting more than 40 million Americans.

events.name: Smoke Pollution in the Midwest
events.wd_description: Smoke from fires in northern Quebec has caused significant air pollution across the Midwest, with smoke being carried southward by a north wind, affecting regions including southern Illinois, Indiana, and Kentucky.
events.description: Smoke from fires in northern Quebec has caused significant air pollution across the Midwest, with smoke being carried southward by a north wind, affecting regions including southern Illinois, Indiana, and Kentucky.

events.name: Warnings and Public Health Precautions
events.wd_description: Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, with officials in cities like Chicago advising vulnerable populations to stay indoors. Daycare and sports centers have also taken precautions to protect children from the smoke.
events.description: Over 80 million people are under air quality warnings, with officials in cities like Chicago advising vulnerable populations to stay indoors. Daycare and sports centers have also taken precautions to protect children from the smoke.

events.name: Russian air strikes on Idlib province, Syria
events.wd_label: Russian air strikes on Idlib province, Syria
events.wd_description: At least nine people were reportedly killed after Russian air strikes on the rebel-held Idlib province in Syria. The United Nations expressed concerns about the hostilities in the province.
events.description: At least nine people were reportedly killed after Russian air strikes on the rebel-held Idlib province in Syria. The United Nations expressed concerns about the hostilities in the province.

events.name: Casualties in Idlib
events.wd_description: Bombs dropped from warplanes killed nine people next to a market outside Jisr al-Shughour, and two others were killed in an air strike near Idlib city.
events.description: Bombs dropped from warplanes killed nine people next to a market outside Jisr al-Shughour, and two others were killed in an air strike near Idlib city.

events.name: Monitoring group's statement
events.wd_description: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group termed the attack the deadliest Russian attack this year.
events.description: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group termed the attack the deadliest Russian attack this year.

events.name: Russia's response
events.wd_description: Russia's military did not comment on the situation immediately. Their air campaign supporting the Syrian government has been crucial in turning the tide of the civil war.
events.description: Russia's military did not comment on the situation immediately. Their air campaign supporting the Syrian government has been crucial in turning the tide of the civil war.

events.name: Retaliation for attacks
events.wd_description: The strikes were said to be a retaliation for attacks that had killed civilians in government-held Hama and Latakia provinces.
events.description: The strikes were said to be a retaliation for attacks that had killed civilians in government-held Hama and Latakia provinces.

events.name: Southeastern Battery Belt Emergence
events.wd_description: The Southeast U.S. is becoming a hub for battery and EV manufacturing due to incentives in the Inflation Reduction Act and the Biden administration's push for decarbonization.
events.description: The Southeast U.S. is becoming a hub for battery and EV manufacturing due to incentives in the Inflation Reduction Act and the Biden administration's push for decarbonization.

events.name: Regional Manufacturing Growth
events.wd_description: The Southeastern U.S. is seeing a surge in billion-dollar battery and EV factory investments, particularly in Georgia and South Carolina.
events.description: The Southeastern U.S. is seeing a surge in billion-dollar battery and EV factory investments, particularly in Georgia and South Carolina.

events.name: t: New Factories
events.wd_description: Companies like SK Corporation, Freyr, and Hyundai are investing billions in new battery and EV factories in the region.
events.description: Companies like SK Corporation, Freyr, and Hyundai are investing billions in new battery and EV factories in the region.

events.name: t: Employment Growth
events.wd_description: The new factories are creating thousands of jobs, making battery and EV production significant employment sectors in the Southeast.
events.description: The new factories are creating thousands of jobs, making battery and EV production significant employment sectors in the Southeast.

events.name: Historical Industrial Base
events.wd_description: The Southeast has a legacy of advanced manufacturing and chemical production, which provides a foundation for the current growth in EV manufacturing.
events.description: The Southeast has a legacy of advanced manufacturing and chemical production, which provides a foundation for the current growth in EV manufacturing.

events.name: t: Chemical Manufacturing Base
events.wd_description: The region built a strong base in chemical and advanced manufacturing industries in the 20th century.
events.description: The region built a strong base in chemical and advanced manufacturing industries in the 20th century.

events.name: t: Automotive Sector Growth
events.wd_description: The Southeast attracted carmakers over the past few decades, creating a foundation for current EV manufacturing growth.
events.description: The Southeast attracted carmakers over the past few decades, creating a foundation for current EV manufacturing growth.

events.name: Local Lithium Resources
events.wd_description: The region has historical lithium mining operations that could be revived to support the local EV supply chain.
events.description: The region has historical lithium mining operations that could be revived to support the local EV supply chain.

events.name: t: Kings Mountain Mine
events.wd_description: Albemarle is conducting feasibility studies to potentially reopen the Kings Mountain lithium mine.
events.description: Albemarle is conducting feasibility studies to potentially reopen the Kings Mountain lithium mine.

events.name: t: Piedmont Lithium Project
events.wd_description: Piedmont Lithium aims to open a new mine in the region, despite facing local opposition.
events.description: Piedmont Lithium aims to open a new mine in the region, despite facing local opposition.
